file.title: Substring

p.text: Allows you to take from the text of any part of it, if you know the serial number of the first character parts and its length. For example, the text "Hello world!" You can get the second word ( "world") indicating that the top piece of the 8th character, and long pieces of 3 characters. In this case, the result of the command will be the word "peace".
